item.title: Global banner
item.description: Description# To display a global banner, that will be rendered on every page, define the globalBanner parameter to true inside the config.toml file. By default, the banner will contain a text about a deprecated version, defined in the banner_default_content variable of the i18n module, using the two following parameters: currentVersion latestVersionUrl Example# The current page is displaying the default banner.

item.title: Single banner
item.description: Description# To display a specific banner, that will be displayed on a single page, define the banner parameter to true inside the front matter of the page. By default, the banner will contain the banner_default_content variable of the i18n module, but it is possible to use a specific text using the bannerContent parameter inside the front matter of the page. Example# Page front matter--- ... banner: true bannerContent: "I'm a banner" .
